title: Quad Trade Ties Grow Despite Tensions Over Russia
sub_head: The security partnership between the U.S., India, Australia and Japan has also provided a boost to the economic relationships between the countries
body:
A security partnership forged to counter China’s expansion is helping to boost trade ties between India, Australia, Japan and the U.S., despite recent tensions over India’s relationship with Russia.
Australia and Japan announced a flurry of new investments in India in recent days. The three countries, along with the U.S., are part of a group of democratic countries called the Quadrilateral Security Dialogue, also known as the Quad.
